changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Cache table for workspace tags with template usage count. Maintained automatically via triggers on tags and template_tags tables. Replaces materialized view for O(1) incremental updates.

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: FK to tags table - cascades on delete

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigram index for fuzzy tag name search
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_workspace_tags_cache_tag_name_trgm ON organizer.workspace_tags_cache USING GIN (tag_name gin_trgm_ops);

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger function to insert cache row when a new tag is created
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION organizer.on_tag_insert() RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$ BEGIN INSERT INTO organizer.workspace_tags_cache ( tag_id, workspace_id, tag_name, tag_color, template_count, tag_created_at ) VALUES ( NEW.id, NEW.workspace_id, NEW.name, NEW.color, 0, NEW.created_at ); RETURN NEW; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger to sync cache on tag insert
changeSet.rollback: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_workspace_tags_cache_on_tag_insert ON organizer.tags;

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger function to update cache row when tag name or color changes

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger to sync cache on tag update
changeSet.rollback: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_workspace_tags_cache_on_tag_update ON organizer.tags;

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger function to increment template_count when template is tagged

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger to increment count on template_tags insert
changeSet.rollback: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_workspace_tags_cache_on_template_tag_insert ON content.template_tags;

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger function to decrement template_count when template tag is removed

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger to decrement count on template_tags delete
changeSet.rollback: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_workspace_tags_cache_on_template_tag_delete ON content.template_tags;

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Procedure to populate cache from existing data. Run once after migration or to rebuild cache if needed.
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION organizer.populate_workspace_tags_cache() RETURNS void AS $$ BEGIN -- Clear existing cache TRUNCATE organizer.workspace_tags_cache;
-- Populate from source tables INSERT INTO organizer.workspace_tags_cache ( tag_id, workspace_id, tag_name, tag_color, template_count, tag_created_at ) SELECT t.id, t.workspace_id, t.name, t.color, COUNT(tt.template_id), t.created_at FROM organizer.tags t LEFT JOIN content.template_tags tt ON tt.tag_id = t.id GROUP BY t.id, t.workspace_id, t.name, t.color, t.created_at; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
